notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, D.S. and O.R.; methodology, N.B., Y.M. and U.B.; software, O.R., X.X. and A.S.; validation, A.S. and N.B.; formal analysis, N.B.; investigation, N.B.; resources, D.S.; Sequence preparation and assembly, T.G.; writing—original draft preparation, N.B.; writing—review and editing, O.R., J.S., P.K., L.A.-D., D.P.; visualization, N.B and A.S.; supervision, D.S. and P.K.; PANGEA project support, L.A.-D.; funding acquisition, D.S., C.F. and P.K. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
